summary: Essential orc follower found in Riverwood. A warrior class with 1h weapons and shields, levels with your character. Also Marriageable.
descriptionHtml:
Khadvak is an Orc follower found in Riverwood - as he\'s right at the beginning of the game I kept his inventory very simple with some steel armor, shield and a sword. He\'ll level with your character as well so he\'s nice and balanced (with the exception of not being able to die!). I also made him marriageable, because it seemed silly to pass up on the option.

I used XCE so if you want him exactly as is in the picture you\'ll need this. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2356

I made him for my mage, but I really liked him so thought I\'d share, but this is my first mod so feedback is very welcome :)

I\'d love to do a backstory on how he came to be in Riverwood, but I\'m yet to find a good tutorial on setting up a dialogue that doesn\'t include a quest, if you can point me to one tyvm :)

PS- had a little trouble packaging this cause steam\'s epic archive system was convinced there were zero files. So I did a little research and did it manually, hope I got it right.
author: Tylia
